mapper.insert: INSERT INTO youtube_video ( source_type, video_url, title, duration_seconds, channel_name, rest_seconds_after, part, youtube_sequence, user_id ) VALUES ( #{sourceType}, #{videoUrl}, #{title}, #{durationSeconds}, #{channelName}, #{restSecondsAfter}, #{part}, #{youtubeSequence}, #{userId} )

INSERT INTO uploaded_video ( video_url, original_filename, title, part, duration_seconds, uploaded_sequence, user_id ) VALUES ( #{videoUrl}, #{originalFilename}, #{title}, #{part}, #{durationSeconds}, #{uploadedSequence}, #{userId} )
INSERT INTO routine ( is_shared, routine_title, routine_content, user_id ) VALUES ( #{isShared}, #{routineTitle}, #{routineContent}, #{userId} )
